name: Sacrifice My Heart
description:
Even witches have their fair share of bad relationships. This one in particular has decided to sacrifice bouquets of flowers from her exes to move forward, but they become demons that she must conquer! 

Real time RPG.

Developed for the GDK Spring Jam 2019 by:

Sunny Mallard - zbrooke.itch.io (Art)

 Fen Wisper - fenwisper.itch.io (Art)

Jess - (Programming)

Dalen W.  Brauner-   (Programming)

James E. Distel - cynthal.itch.io (Sound)
